description:
This domineering and foul-tempered fellow is an executive of the lunar corporation known as Anaheim Electronics, one of the primary sponsors of the AEUG, resistance group. As the personal representative of Anaheim chairman Melanie Hue Carbine, Wong feels perfectly entitled to meddle in the AEUG`s strategic planning or physically discipline ill-mannered recruits like Kamille Bidan.
Source: Official Site
name: Wong Lee
